quests.title: Find My Cat
quests.description: My little kitty ventured outside. Please find her! She's probably so scared right now. What if the rats bully her?

quests.title: Gather Medicinal Herbs
quests.description: A rare flower that blooms once in a century and grows only in the crater of Mount Doom. Please risk your life and find it. There's a sick old man coughing in bed somewhere.

quests.title: Escort Mission
quests.description: A young damsel eager to be in distress has requested for a hero, preferrably in a shining armor, to be at her side for the appointed hour.

quests.title: Defeat Monsters
quests.description: It wouldn't be a fantasy world without monsters. You're an adventurer, so stop reading this and hurry up and go kill some monsters or something.

quests.title: Exterminate Slimes
quests.description: The most popular fantasy monster. Cute, jiggly, and beginner-friendly. Go whack'em!

quests.title: Rescue My Brat
quests.description: My rude little boy that I refuse to train properly, has gone missing after throwing a tantrum during a monster invasion. Please take your time finding him. I'm not in any hurry.

quests.title: Defeat the Boss
quests.description: Yes, yes, you're having so much fun. You probably don't want to finish the game just yet, but the boss is waiting in his castle. He's bored out of his mind right now. Why don't you put him out of his misery?
